function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of statistical methods and randomization in experiments","Impact":"Risk of biased results and inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Implement proper statistical methods and randomization techniques","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, randomization tools","People":"Researchers, investigators","Owner":"Research team, institutions"},{"Description":"Variability in data collection and availability","Impact":"Inconsistent or incomplete data across different countries","Mitigation":"Standardize data collection procedures and improve data accessibility","Technologies":"Data management systems, open data platforms","People":"Data collectors, researchers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inaccurate or incomplete data reporting sources","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the disease spread and policy effectiveness","Mitigation":"Verify and cross-reference data from multiple reliable sources","Technologies":"Data validation tools, cross-referencing software","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Epidemiological authorities, research organizations"}]}
